latest.content:
20 Jan 2026 15:19
RNS Number : 6432P
Avon Technologies Plc
20 January 2026
20 January 2026
Avon Technologies plc
("the Company")
Notification and public disclosure of transactions by PDMRS
Avon Technologies plc announces that on 19 January 2026, ordinary shares of £1 each were acquired by Jos Sclater, a PDMR, pursuant to an award held under the Company's Long Term Incentive Plan that vested on 19 January 2026.
The Award vested at 50% based on the final assessment of the Award's performance conditions.
Set out below are the number of shares acquired by Jos Sclater together with the number of such shares sold on the same date and the number of shares retained following the sale.

latest.title: Directors'/PDMR Shareholdings
latest.content:
6 Jan 2026 13:46
RNS Number : 8653N
Avon Technologies Plc
06 January 2026
6 January 2026
Avon Technologies plc
("Avon" or "the Group")
Directors'/PDMR Shareholdings
Share Incentive Plan
Avon Technologies plc was notified on 6 January 2026 that the following purchases of Avon Technologies plc ordinary shares were made by Equiniti Share Plan Trustees Limited on 5 January 2026 on behalf of two of the Group's persons discharging managerial responsibilities ('PDMR') pursuant to the Group's Share Incentive Plan (SIP).
The SIP is an all-employee share plan arrangement approved by HM Revenue and Customs, under which employees are able to buy ordinary shares in Avon Technologies plc using deductions from salary in each monthly pay period.
This notification is made in order to satisfy both section 793 of the Companies Act 2006 and the requirements of the EU Market Abuse Regulation.
The information contained in the below notifications are disclosed in accordance with Article 19 of the EU Market Abuse Regulation.

About Avon Technologies plc:
Avon Technologies plc make products that are trusted to protect the world's militaries and first responders.
Our dedicated teams achieve this by developing mission-critical solutions that enhance our customers' performance, efficiency and capability, whilst providing ever-increasing levels of protection.
With a portfolio that includes respiratory and head protection systems, we are renowned for our innovative thinking and our steadfast approach to manufacturing unrivalled products.
For further information, please visit our website
www.avon-technologiesplc.com

recovery_paths: Order book growth or new contracts

panic_analysis.opportunity_reason: 📊 Moderate fear detected - monitor for escalation

fear_vs_facts.verdict: 🎯 CONTRARIAN OPPORTUNITY - Fear dominates but facts support recovery potential

volume_death.description: High volume - Panic spike or interest

technical_score.reason: AI Technical Score 15.0/20 translates to 19/25 points

reasons_to_buy.reason: Proven winner - previously hit lock-in target

reasons_to_sell.reason: Stale signal - not for active trading

trader_plan.risk: Stop below recent support / invalidation level
trader_plan.profit_taking: Scale out into strength: 25% @ +15%, 50% @ +50%, trail runner

investor_plan.thesis_conditions: Unlock after AI triangulation + CONFIRMED timing

commentary.executive_summary: This report runs in HISTORICAL-ONLY mode: triangulation (RNS/social/trends) not loaded. The setup shows CROWDED timing with 63/100 APEX score. Historical data shows 4 rallies averaging 135% upside. Current position: +111.3%. Your edge comes from waiting for AI Engine confirmation instead of blind entry.
commentary.timing_translation: Late stage. Consider taking profits as risk/reward deteriorates.
commentary.confidence_explained: Confidence 45/100 reflects full data quality with triangulation loaded.

data_quality.disclaimer: Data provided as-is. Not financial advice. AIM micro-caps carry significant volatility risk.
